The Life of a Butterfly

A butterfly starts life as a small egg. The egg has been stuck on a leaf by a {l}Mother butterfly. One day the {-|the} egg hatches. A little caterpillar comes out. It eats the leaf. Every day the caterpillar eats more and more leaves. It grows bigger and bigger. Then it changes again. The caterpillar sticks itself to a twig. Slowly its skin splits open. Then a pupa forms. The pupa is a kind of shell{.} Inside the shell, a butterfly will grow. When the butterfly has finished growing, the pupa splits open. A butterfly crawls out. {u}it has wings {+|and} legs. It dries its wings in the sun. {u}then it flies away.
